<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Towering Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3939) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 33</row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Faultspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3937)

</column>

---

You fill an area with your force of will, towering beyond where your true form should be. Increase your size to Large until the beginning of your next turn. Your equipment grows with you but returns to natural size if removed. You're [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3). Your [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. Towering Presence has no effect if you were already Large or larger.
name: Towering Presence
